יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD הֶֽעֱלִ֣יתָ <WH5927> he-'e-Li-ta thou hast brought up מִן־ <WH4480> min- from שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> she-'ol from the grave נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; my soul חִ֝יִּיתַ֗נִי <WH2421> chi-yi-Ta-ni, thou hast kept me alive; מִיֹּורְדֵי־ mi-yor-dei- כמִיָּֽרְדִי־ <WH3381> mi-ya-re-di- go בֽוֹר׃ <WH3381> Vor. go ק

זַמְּר֣וּ <WH2167> zam-me-Ru Sing לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD חֲסִידָ֑יו <WH2623> cha-si-Dav; O ye saints וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ <WH3034> ve-ho-Du, of his and give thanks לְזֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> le-Ze-cher at the remembrance קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho. of his holiness

וַ֭אֲנִי <WH589> Va-'a-ni I אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti I said בְשַׁלְוִ֑י <WH7959> ve-shal-Vi; And in my prosperity בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- lest אֶמּ֥וֹט <WH4131> em-Mot be moved לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> le-'o-Lam. I shall never

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD בִּרְצוֹנְךָ֮ <WH7522> bir-tzon-Cha by thy favour הֶעֱמַ֪דְתָּה <WH5975> he-'e-Mad-tah to stand לְֽהַרְרִ֫י <WH2042> le-har-Ri thou hast made my mountain עֹ֥ז <WH5797> 'oz strong הִסְתַּ֥רְתָּ <WH5641> his-Tar-ta thou didst hide פָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> fa-Nei-cha, thy face הָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti become נִבְהָֽל׃ <WH926> niv-Hal. [and] I was troubled

אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha to you יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh to thee O LORD אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> 'ek-Ra; I cried וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai, the Lord אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃ <WH2603> 'et-chan-Nan. I made supplication

שְׁמַע־ <WH8085> she-ma'- Hear יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD וְחָנֵּ֑נִי <WH2603> ve-chon-Ne-ni and have mercy יְ֝הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh upon me LORD הֱ‍ ֽיֵה־ <WH1961> heyeh- become עֹזֵ֥ר <WH5826> 'o-Zer be thou my helper לִֽי׃ Li.

הָפַ֣כְתָּ <WH2015> ha-Fach-ta Thou hast turned מִסְפְּדִי֮ <WH4553> mis-pe-Di for me my mourning לְמָח֪וֹל <WH4234> le-ma-Chol into dancing לִ֥י li פִּתַּ֥חְתָּ <WH6605> pit-Tach-ta thou hast put off שַׂקִּ֑י <WH8242> sak-Ki; my sackcloth וַֽתְּאַזְּרֵ֥נִי <WH247> vat-te-'az-ze-Re-ni and girded שִׂמְחָֽה׃ <WH8057> sim-Chah. me with gladness

לְמַ֤עַן׀ <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because of יְזַמֶּרְךָ֣ <WH2167> ye-zam-mer-Cha may sing כָ֭בוֹד <WH3519> Cha-Vod To the end that [my] glory וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יִדֹּ֑ם <WH1826> yid-Dom; praise to thee and not be silent יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai, my God לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam unto thee for ever אוֹדֶֽךָּ׃ <WH3034> o-De-ka. I will give thanks
